title: The Christmas Show | Ep. 2
itunes:title: The Christmas Show | Ep. 2
description:
In this special Christmas episode, DC Young Fly and Karlous Miller talk about Cold Christmas nipples, Bill Cosby, and how you know you're at a ghetto ass Christmas. Plus, DC tells stories about growing up in the church and dealing with crackhead family members.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
